verses.verse: If one be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5307>it,<s%> lying in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and it <S%H3045>isn't<s%> known who has struck <S%H5221>him;<s%>

then your <S%H2205>elders<s%> and your <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and they shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H5439>around<s%> him who is <S%H2491>slain:<s%>

and it shall <S%H5892>be,<s%> that the city which is <S%H7138>nearest<s%> to the slain <S%H2491>man,<s%> even the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1241>heifer<s%> of the <S%H5647>herd,<s%> which hasn't been worked with, and which has not <S%H4900>drawn<s%> in the <S%H5923>yoke;<s%>

and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> to <S%H386>a<s%> <S%H5158>valley<s%> with running <S%H5647>water,<s%> which is neither plowed nor <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and shall <S%H6202>break<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%>'s <S%H6202>neck<s%> there in the <S%H5158>valley.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> shall come <S%H5066>near;<s%> for them <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H1288>him,<s%> and to bless in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and according to their <S%H6310>word<s%> shall every <S%H7379>controversy<s%> and every stroke <S%H5061>be.<s%>

All the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city,<s%> who are <S%H7138>nearest<s%> to the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H7364>man,<s%> shall wash their <S%H3027>hands<s%> over the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> whose neck was <S%H6202>broken<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley;<s%>
and they shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> "Our <S%H3027>hands<s%> have not <S%H8210>shed<s%> this <S%H1818>blood,<s%> neither have our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> seen <S%H7200>it.<s%>

<S%H3722>Forgive,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom you have <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> and <S%H5414>don't<s%> allow <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>" The <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be forgiven <S%H3722>them.<s%>

So you shall put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6213>you,<s%> when you shall do that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

When you go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivers<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and you <S%H7617>carry<s%> them away <S%H7628>captive,<s%>
and <S%H7200>see<s%> among the <S%H7633>captives<s%> a <S%H8389>beautiful<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and you have a <S%H2836>desire<s%> to <S%H3947>her,<s%> and would take her to you as <S%H802>wife;<s%>
then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H8432>home<s%> to your <S%H1004>house;<s%> and she shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6213>pare<s%> her <S%H6856>nails;<s%>

and she shall <S%H5493>put<s%> the <S%H8071>clothing<s%> of her <S%H7628>captivity<s%> from off <S%H3427>her,<s%> and shall remain in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1058>bewail<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> and her <S%H517>mother<s%> a <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H3391>month:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that you shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H1166>her,<s%> and be her husband, and she shall be your <S%H802>wife.<s%>

It shall <S%H2654>be,<s%> if you have no delight in <S%H7971>her,<s%> then you shall let her go where she <S%H5315>will;<s%> but you shall not <S%H4376>sell<s%> her at <S%H4376>all<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> you shall not <S%H6014>deal<s%> with her as a <S%H834>slave,<s%> because you have humbled <S%H6031>her.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H157>beloved,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H8130>hated,<s%> and they have <S%H3205>borne<s%> him <S%H1121>children,<s%> both the <S%H157>beloved<s%> and the <S%H8130>hated;<s%> and if the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> be hers who was <S%H8146>hated;<s%>

then it shall <S%H3117>be,<s%> in the day that he causes his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> that which he <S%H3201>has,<s%> that he may not make the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H157>beloved<s%> the <S%H1069>firstborn<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>hated,<s%> who is the <S%H1060>firstborn:<s%>

but he shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>hated,<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him a <S%H8147>double<s%> <S%H6310>portion<s%> of all that he <S%H4672>has;<s%> for he is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H202>strength;<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the firstborn is <S%H1062>his.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> have a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> who will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H3256>and,<s%> though they chasten <S%H8085>him,<s%> will not listen to them;

then shall his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H3318>him,<s%> and bring him out to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H4725>place;<s%>

and they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> "This our <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious,<s%> he will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> our <S%H6963>voice;<s%> he is a <S%H2151>glutton,<s%> and a <S%H5433>drunkard.<s%>"

All the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H7275>stones:<s%> so you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>you;<s%> and all Israel shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear.<s%>
If a <S%H376>man<s%> have committed a <S%H2399>sin<s%> worthy <S%H4941>of<s%> <S%H4194>death,<s%> and he be put to <S%H4194>death,<s%> and you <S%H8518>hang<s%> him on a <S%H6086>tree;<s%>

his <S%H5038>body<s%> shall not remain all <S%H3885>night<s%> on the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> but you shall <S%H6912>surely<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> him the same <S%H3117>day;<s%> for he who is <S%H8518>hanged<s%> is <S%H7045>accursed<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> that you <S%H2930>don't<s%> defile your <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
